title: Use multiplier to calculate max change in GDP

content.question: Assume that the marginal propensity to consume is 0.75, net exports decline by $10 billion, and government spending increases by $20 billion. Given that there is no crowding out, the equilibrium gross domestic product can increase by a maximum of

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
